list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: having a pleasant sound; melodious or tuneful.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they burst out into rich, musical laughter

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a play or movie in which singing and dancing play an essential part. Musicals developed from light opera in the early 20th century.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a hit West End musical, Miss Saigon
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một hit West End Music, Miss Saigon
